WebkitNativeMMLWarning: Yer brouser disna seem tae support MathsML nateevelie, sae switchin til MathsML ootput micht cause the mathematics oan the page tae become onreadable
MSIENativeMMLWarning: Internet Explorer needs the MathsPlayer plug-in fer tae process MathsML ootput.
OperaNativeMMLWarning: Opera's support fer MathsML is limited, sae switchin til MathsML ootput micht cause some expressions tae render puirlie.
SafariNativeMMLWarning: Yer brouser's native MathsML disna implement aw the features uised bi MathsJax, sae some expressions michtna render properlie.
FirefoxNativeMMLWarning: Yer brouser's native MathsML disna implement aw the features uised bi MathJax, sae some expressions michtna render properlie.
MSIESVGWarning: SVG isna implemented in Internet Explorer prior til IE9 or whan it's emulating IE8 or ablo. Switchin til SVG ootput will cause the mathematics tae no displey properlie.
LoadURL: Laid owersetin data fae this URL:
BadURL: The URL shid be fer ae JavaScript file that defines MathsJax owersetin data. JavaScript file names shid end wi '.js'
BadData: Failed tae laid owersetin data fae $1
SwitchAnyway:
Switch the renderer oniewas?

(Press OK tae switch, CANCEL tae continue wi the current renderer)
ScaleMath: Scale aw mathematics (compared til surroondin tex) bi
PercentScale: The scale shid be ae percentage (fer example 120%)
IE8warning:
This will disable the MathsJax menu n zuim features, but ye can Alt-Clap oan aen expression tae obtain the MathsJax menu instead.

Reallie want tae chynge the MathsPleyer settins?
IE9warning: The MathsJax contextual menu will be disabled, but ye can Alt-Clap oan aen expression tae obtain the MathsJax menu instead.
